lead_paragraph: Michael Slager, a former South Carolina police officer who faces murder charges, was released on bond in the shooting of Mr. Scott, an unarmed black man.
snippet: Michael Slager, a former South Carolina police officer who faces murder charges, was released on bond in the shooting of Mr. Scott, an unarmed black man.

headline.main: Ex-Officer Freed Pending Trial in Killing of Walter Scott
headline.print_headline: Former Officer Is Free on Bond Pending Trial in Man’s Death

abstract: Judge Clifton Newman grants bond for former South Carolina Police Officer Michael T Slager as he awaits murder trial in shooting death of unarmed black man Walter L Scott.
